OOC: Damn, forgot to post with Quatro!

IC: Quatro's mind started to hurt, =
he could only tap into Decepticon information for a limited time and do a l=
imited amount of things before it started hurting him.  Quatro didn't make =
any noise, even though he started to hurt all in his body a little, 'cause =
he couldn't risk being caught up in the vents.  He had to let the pain ease=
 by itself.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: LurkerAbyss 
  To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, May 06, 2001 8:15 PM
  Subject: Re: Sla=
ughter's Rampage 


  OOC: Rdahl, the damage done to Quatro here is the lea=
st I can do after I left you no chance to respond to all my actions.

  ::S=
laughter/Quatro::

       Slaughter was just about to cram Squawktalk into =
his mouth, when he felt sudden pain.  His pincir let go of Squawktalk, and =
then he roared a loud roar.  His mind was taken off of Squawktalk, and he s=
tared at Cepta.  Hmm.  This bot was bigger than the metallic bird, and migh=
t make an even better meal.  Squawktalk might make a good dessert, anyway. =
 Slaughter just stood there for literally 5 minutes(if that's okay with you=
 guys), slime constantly dripping from his body.  Then, Slaughter took his =
right pincir and tried to grab Cepta by the neck.

        Yahoo! Groups Sp=
onsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo=
! Terms of Service.
